definition: genre/style/form of writing
body/form/style/system/substance/to experience/aspect (linguistics)
to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment
lit. measure the body then tailor the suit (idiom); fig. to act according to actual circumstances/To live within one's means.
lit. tailor the clothes to fit the body (idiom); fig. act according to real circumstances
eat depending on the dish, cut cloth according to the body (idiom); to fit the appetite to the dishes and the dress to the figure/to act according to actual circumstances/to live within one's means
pinyin: kan1 cai4 chi1 fan4 , liang2 ti3 cai2 yi1

sentences.english: Why to examine the difference between literary language to the difference from the genre?
sentences.chinese: 为什么从体裁差别的角度去探讨文学语言的区别。

sentences.english: The second chapter analyzed the external factors of music's genres changes.
sentences.chinese: 第三章因情立体，洞察音乐体裁流变的中介因素。

sentences.english: Tailor each letter to the open position, identifying your accomplishments and achievements.
sentences.chinese: 对每一个岗位量体裁衣，写明你的成绩和成就。

sentences.english: There are many types or genres of material in the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 圣经里有各种不同的写作风格和体裁。

sentences.english: I’ve written a novel and a non-fiction book. I write this blog.
sentences.chinese: 我已经写了一部小说并出了一部散文体裁的书。

sentences.english: The pluralizing of minoritarian literature and its poetics is one of the most important features in American postmodernism.
sentences.chinese: 后现代派小说是二十世纪美国文学的主要体裁。

sentences.english: Not exactly right, it is a genre of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 不完全对，其实它是一种诗的体裁。

sentences.english: As a poetic form in Chinese poetry, the trisyllabic verse has been ignored in the academic circle over a long period.
sentences.chinese: 在中国诗歌体裁中，三言是一种极少受到关注的类型。

sentences.english: Independently design and tailor for different customers based on individual needs.
sentences.chinese: 依据个性化需求为不同的客户独立设计量体裁衣。

sentences.english: The seven-character quatrain is one of the most representative forms of the Tang poetry.
sentences.chinese: 七言绝句是唐代诗歌中最具代表性的体裁之一。

sentences.english: It is significant that all Carters works are tinged with the Gothic.
sentences.chinese: 卡特在创作生涯中贯穿使用了哥特体裁。

sentences.english: The order of the day in that genre is "short and sweet".
sentences.chinese: 的命令，在这一天体裁是“短期和甜”。

sentences.english: Much of the previous research has mainly dealt with expository writing.
sentences.chinese: 以前的对比修辞研究主要集中在说明文体裁上。

sentences.english: Time is a dressmaker, specializing in altreations.
sentences.chinese: 时间是一个裁缝，擅长于量体裁衣。

sentences.english: Filmmaking is all about genres and having a strong antagonist.
sentences.chinese: 电影制作是有体裁的，都有强烈的反派角色。

sentences.english: Palindrome poem is a unique literature type of the ancient poems of our country.
sentences.chinese: 回文诗是我国古典诗歌中一种较为独特的体裁。

definition: a pre-Tang Dynasty genre of poetry, relatively free in form, usually having four, five, six or seven characters per line
genre of writing/literary form/style/literary recreation and sporting activities
narrative poem
a genre of poetry, developed in the Tang Dynasty, characterized by its strict form
narrative writing/written narration
poetic form or genre
regular verse/strict poetic form with eight lines of 5, 6 or 7 syllables and even lines rhyming
lyric poetry
poetry in the old style
poem/CL:本[ben3],首[shou3],段[duan4]
prose/essay
forms of versification/conventions regarding set number of words and lines, choice of tonal patterns and rhyme schemes for various types of Classical Chinese poetic composition/metrical verse
essay
applied writing/writing for practical purposes (business letters, advertising etc)
literary work/art work
names of the tunes to which 詞|词[ci2] poems are composed
